channel.title: DevOps on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Uptime Robot - Free monitoring your server
item.description: Do you need to know your website or server still alive from internet? Uptime Robot will help you to monitoring your server from internet and it is free! For free user, Uptime Robot provide 50 monitors and check it every 5 minutes, you can upgrade your account to pro plan then you can monitoring every 30 seconds.
